CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) photovoltaic device combining P3HT as the electron donor with [6,6]-phenyl C 61 butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) as the electron acceptor have achieved power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) as high as 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

1. Bulk heterojunction (BHJ) - This is a type of photovoltaic device, not a material.
2. P3HT - This is the material named as the electron donor in the BHJ photovoltaic device.
3. [6,6]-phenyl C61 butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) - This is the material named as the electron acceptor in the BHJ photovoltaic device.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are P3HT and PCBM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. P3HT
2. PCBM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) photovoltaic device combining P3HT as the electron donor with [6,6]-phenyl C 61 butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) as the electron acceptor have achieved power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) as high as 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

1. Bulk heterojunction (BHJ)
2. P3HT (Poly(3-hexylthiophene)) - electron donor
3. [6,6]-phenyl C61 butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) - electron acceptor
4. Power conversion efficiencies (PCEs)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. P3HT (Poly(3-hexylthiophene)) - electron donor material
2. [6,6]-phenyl C61 butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) - electron acceptor material
3. Power conversion efficiencies (PCEs) - material property (specific to photovoltaic devices)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| P3HT (Poly(3-hexylthiophene)) - electron donor material |
| [6,6]-phenyl C61 butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) - electron acceptor material |
| Power conversion efficiencies (PCEs) - material property (specific to photovoltaic devices) |

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) photovoltaic device combining P3HT as the electron donor with [6,6]-phenyl C 61 butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) as the electron acceptor have achieved power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) as high as 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

1. Bulk heterojunction (BHJ)
2. P3HT
3. [6,6]-phenyl C61 butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM)
4. power conversion efficiencies (PCEs)
5. 4-5 % (percentage)

These are the identified "Property Value" entities in the paragraph. P3HT and PCBM are materials used in the BHJ photovoltaic device, while the power conversion efficiencies and the specific value of 4-5% are the properties or outcomes of the device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
